akn:section.akn:heading: Information on United States participation in United Nations

akn:content.akn:p: § 1432. Information on United States participation in United Nations In carrying out the objectives of this chapter, information concerning the participation of the United States in the United Nations, its organizations and functions, shall be emphasized. (Jan. 27, 1948, ch. 36, title I, § 3, 62 Stat. 6.)
